name: @cloudflare/quick-edit
description: VSCode for Web hosted for use in Cloudflare's Quick Editor
author: workers-devprod@cloudflare.com

scripts.dev: concurrently '../../vendor/vscode/scripts/code-web.sh --extensionDevelopmentPath ../../packages/quick-edit/web/quick-edit-extension' 'npm --prefix web/quick-edit-extension run watch-web' 'yarn --cwd ../../vendor/vscode watch' 'yarn --cwd ../../vendor/vscode watch-web'
